Data Integration / Analytic Discovery / Intelligent Systems

We build data systems that turn complex information into actionable insight.

The Danais Lab (Data Nexus for Analytics & Intelligent Systems) advances foundational and applied research at the intersection of data integration, analytic discovery, and intelligent systems engineering. We develop next-generation database architectures, scalable data infrastructure, and analytic frameworks that automate the transformation of complex information into actionable insight.
